lenders.name: Rosemary Gordon
lenders.loan_because: I have encountered abuse, poverty, and many other issues that no one should face alone. I am a "Believer" that we as a society want to always help one another. I think it does not happen as often as it could for lack of a financial mode in which we could assist. KIVA allows us to choose what we are able to give and it allows us not to give charity but a form of Empowerment which will liberate those going through difficult times. My empowerment came from a loan of $20.00 to buy a pair of shoes so that I may return to school to get an education.  I am blessed and believe that we MUST pass it on.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to educate, support and advocate for those in need.

However, I have dreamed of building a web design company that significantly invests in the real world through our virtual medium. My soon to go live portfolio site Red-Tie.net, will feature a Green-Tie section which will link to Kiva. A portion of all profits will go to a specific lender until the loan is filled. Clients will be encouraged to donate. It is my hope that I can make a difference in both the real and virtual world through my work.
lenders.occupational_info: I build websites for individuals and companies that want to reach more clients/consumers. I create sites that reflect my client's interests and products in a way that can be easily viewed by online visitors.

lenders.occupational_info: We are a company that creates space. We help people find time in their busy schedules by taking care of things for them- grocery shopping, errands, housework, party and event planning, and much more! We help simplify life for people so that they have time for what is important.

lenders.loan_because: It helps to share

lenders.name: Chantal
lenders.loan_because: Every day I work with refugees who were forced to leave their countries and come to Canada due to violence, economic hardship, and political unrest. I feel it is so important to assist those who are able to remain safely in their home country and allow them to create and live a meaningful life.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: I want to support women entrepreneurs and take my part to alleviate poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to make health care better, especially for children.

lenders.name: John Trosko
lenders.loan_because:
I am a small fish in a big pond.  I know how difficult it is to g-r-o-w your business without working capital, even just a little here and there.

I've had the fortunate opportunity to have friends lend me money at different (and sometimes critical) stages of my business. Some were small loans, and some were large loans.  It all adds up and I've repaid them and worked even harder than before.

For now, I am checking out Kiva to see how I can help.  Looking to help people who want to be more productive and save time so their business can grow.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am Los Angeles-based professional organizer, blogger, business owner and contributing author.

My consulting firm helps clients be better organized and more productive in their homes and businesses and manages relocations. Many of our clients have projects that they simply want done for them.  An equal part of the business are folks who want the "skill" of organizing transfered to them. We teach these people how to make decisions, break projects down into small managable chunks and provide extraordinary motivation so they keep themselves on track.

I am a two-term president of the Los Angeles chapter of the National Association of Professional Organizers (NAPO-LA) and am also a member of the International Association for Private Service Professionals (IAPSP).

Born and raised in Princeton, New Jersey, I've been a resident of Los Angeles for nearly 15 years.  I've got a background in creative organizational management, public relations and arts administration.

lenders.name: Pete Gromadzinski
lenders.loan_because: to whom much is given, much will be required. Luke 12:48

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: Offering a loan offers hope. With hope anything can be accomplished.

lenders.name: Marie
lenders.loan_because: little things can make big changes in a person's life.

lenders.name: Caz
lenders.loan_because: It is an honour to share life's bounties.  Just paying it forward, Life's been good to me.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in operations as a Lean SixSigma process design and improvement specialist (Lean SixSigma Black Belt).

lenders.occupational_info: I work for an humanitarian organisation.  My role is help allocate funds to projects in developing countries.

lenders.name: Brent

lenders.occupational_info: I make bronze sculptures for public places and private collectors. The sculptures are at college campus's, city centers where people meet, churches, libraries and private homes.  I have also sculpted a portrait of a Nobel scientist now working in malaria research. Let's hope he is successful.

lenders.name: Marcel
lenders.loan_because: I want to be a go giver not a go getter
lenders.occupational_info:
I have exhaustively researched, tried and reviewed some of the more popular work from home programs, and the results are here for you to see. There are hundreds, if not thousands of different get rich quick programs and we hope our reviews help in filtering out the bad and pointing you to the good.

So before you invest your hard earned money on one of those luring ‘Get Rich Quick ’ products, be sure to read our work from home reviews.

lenders.name: Belinda
lenders.loan_because: being able to help others in even the smallest way brings me joy.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the power of simple acts of kindness.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help others improve the quality of their lives.

lenders.name: Trevor
lenders.loan_because:
i could put my money in stocks... maybe i would get rich fast,
i could take my money to Vegas... if i played my cards right i could take the house for all it's worth,
i could put my money in a savings bond... Earning 1-3% interest would be a sure thing.
All things considered though giving the opportunity to others to achieve their dreams is interest enough for me.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student

lenders.name: Tanya Gulliver
lenders.loan_because: I value creating opportunities for others to take charge of their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach students about issues of homelessness and community development. I am also a PhD student myself.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I have worked for myself for many years, and I know how difficult it can be to find the financial help needed to start an independent business. I also believe we are all connected as human beings, and as a "global family" we should help each other do well.
lenders.occupational_info: I find things in nature, collect them, and sell them to artisans who turn things that were once waste into jewelry and objects of art.

lenders.name: Christopher & Michelle
lenders.loan_because: If it helps somebody, then why shouldn't we?

lenders.name: Evolving Planet
lenders.loan_because: Evolving Planet is a non-profit organization dedicated to preserving the human race. The purpose for the Evolving Planet movement is for humans to understand we are living in a changing and ever evolving universe. Planet Earth encounters many changes and humans are affected in positive and negative ways. To preserve the balance, Evolving Planet movement's objective is to give financial support and aid to all organizations dedicated for a positive cause for humanity. These causes are meant to provide help to victims in need of assistance globally.
lenders.occupational_info:
Evolving Planet - Preserving The Human Race

Programs:
Free World Education Online Program from (K-12th grade) sponsored by MIT (Massachusetts Institute of Technology and Science) using Microsoft Cloud Interface.

Housing For Battered Women and Victims of Domestic Violence
sponsored by SEWA Inc.(Social Economic Welfare for All) in Trinidad and Tobago and the University of West Indies (Trinidad).

Microlending Platform in collaboration with Kiva.org portal for small businesses in developing nations that support the United States Government.

Sustainable Energy Technology Research and Development Team
sponsored by Platinum International Holding Corporation and The University of West Indies (Trinidad).

World Food Bank Public Trust Fund for Victims of Natural Disasters Globally establishing January 2011 by Evolving Planet Public Trust.

lenders.name: Dana
lenders.loan_because: Small steps like this will eventually aggregate to help change the world and make it a better place. First World citizens can surely afford to loan as little as $25 to assist someone who is earnestly trying to better their situation. It could mean the world to them!
lenders.occupational_info: My background is in advertising and I am currently searching for a new position.

lenders.occupational_info: I study public schools, and how to help kids be successful after high school education.  I also rollerskate!

lenders.occupational_info: I create materials and lessons that teach children and adults about science.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: Direct investment in individuals is the best way I know of helping.  We often feel lost and powerless to do anything meaningful.  Micro financing changes the world one person at a time.

I write music for film and television, as well as songs for sale.

I am also active in the Green Party of Nova Scotia and the Green Party of Canada.

lenders.occupational_info: I build authentic websites that are tailor made for you, your business and your customers.

lenders.name: Eric Yohe
lenders.loan_because: The real 1% don't have tents and food kitchens, running water, and Starbucks.  Kiva makes a real and meaningful difference in peoples lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to brand and enhance companies profiles for a variety of B2B, B2C and Financial services companies.  I try to always give back a percentage to charity as a standard way of doing business.

lenders.name: Allen
lenders.loan_because: When I'm feeling down it makes me feel better to be helping someone less fortunate than me.
